name: Solusi Bengkel Digital Pte. Ltd.
description: Developer of B2B e-commerce platform designed to digitize automotive workshops. The company platform offers various vehicle parts, other equipment, and lubricants at wholesale rates and quantities from various digital vendors, enabling small-medium workshops to market their products and supplies more effectively and efficiently.
one_liner: Developer of B2B e-commerce platform designed to digitize automotive workshops. The company platform offers various vehicle parts, other equipment, and lubricants at wholesale rates and quantities from various digital vendors, enabling small-medium workshops to market their products and supplies more effectively and efficiently.

name: ClickMechanic LTD
description: Developer of an online car-repair marketplace intended to connect with car owners and mobile mechanics and provide car-related services. The company's marketplace features a customized portal for repairing and servicing the clutch, water pumps, and brake pads among the other car parts, enabling car owners to get their cars repaired and serviced in an easy way without the need to go to a car repair shop.
one_liner: Developer of an online car-repair marketplace intended to connect with car owners and mobile mechanics and provide car-related services. The company's marketplace features a customized portal for repairing and servicing the clutch, water pumps, and brake pads among the other car parts, enabling car owners to get their cars repaired and serviced in an easy way without the need to go to a car repair shop.

name: Drover Inc.
description: Developer of micro-mobility technologies designed to elevate the micro-mobility industry and tie into the smart city eco-systems. The company develops an advanced IoT module for micro-mobility vehicles that is capable of granular infrastructure distinction in real-time without the need for ground truth information or precise GPS and can accurately and reliably identify sidewalks, streets, and bike lanes, enabling cities to manage regulatory compliance across multiple operators simultaneously and users to navigate without hassle.
one_liner: Developer of micro-mobility technologies designed to elevate the micro-mobility industry and tie into the smart city eco-systems. The company develops an advanced IoT module for micro-mobility vehicles that is capable of granular infrastructure distinction in real-time without the need for ground truth information or precise GPS and can accurately and reliably identify sidewalks, streets, and bike lanes, enabling cities to manage regulatory compliance across multiple operators simultaneously and users to navigate without hassle.

name: EAS Innovations Inc.
description: Developer of a business software platform designed to revolutionize dealership management. The company's all-in-one platform streamlines dealership operations and brings the power of real-time accounting to the forefront of the industry, enabling clients to give advance dealer management system.
one_liner: Developer of a business software platform designed to revolutionize dealership management. The company's all-in-one platform streamlines dealership operations and brings the power of real-time accounting to the forefront of the industry, enabling clients to give advance dealer management system.

name: iMotorbike Pte. Ltd.
description: Operator of a motorcycle marketplace intended to transform motorcycle sales in Southeast Asia. The company's marketplace offers a wide selection of motorcycles from a variety of brands and models and also provides a search engine that makes it easy to find motorcycles by make, model and location, enabling motorbike owners and two-wheeler enthusiasts to have a comprehensive motorcycle database that provides information about the same and find the suitable motorcycle for their needs.
one_liner: Operator of a motorcycle marketplace intended to transform motorcycle sales in Southeast Asia. The company's marketplace offers a wide selection of motorcycles from a variety of brands and models and also provides a search engine that makes it easy to find motorcycles by make, model and location, enabling motorbike owners and two-wheeler enthusiasts to have a comprehensive motorcycle database that provides information about the same and find the suitable motorcycle for their needs.

name: Ion Mobility Pte. Ltd.
description: Manufacturer of technology and automotive original equipment intended to create and deliver sustainable mobility and energy assistance. The company develops electric motorbikes with a competency equivalent to gasoline vehicles and combines advanced hardware and software technology with human-centered design to deliver smart electric motorbikes and energy charging and storage services, enabling consumers to transform how they move and get affordable and sustainable mobility.

name: Mekan Spare parts LLC
description: Operator of an online transformative platform designed to facilitate rapid and improved growth for the automotive sector. The company offers streamlined access to all essential automotive repair and mechanics resources for all automotive brands, ensuring efficient procurement at reasonable costs and providing unparalleled delivery speed, enabling Latam automotive sector's mechanical workshops with the supply of spare parts.

The company offers streamlined access to all essential automotive repair and mechanics resources for all automotive brands, ensuring efficient procurement at reasonable costs and providing unparalleled delivery speed, enabling Latam automotive sector's mechanical workshops with the supply of spare parts.

name: Meshcrafts AS
description: Developer of an EV charging platform intended to offer an open marketplace for electric vehicle charging.
one_liner: Developer of an EV charging platform intended to offer an open marketplace for electric vehicle charging.

name: Mojio, Inc.
description: Developer of a modular SaaS platform designed to build, launch, and scale connected mobility services. The company's platform, applications, and services deliver a smarter, safer, and more convenient car ownership experience for the global driving community and offer GPS fleet tracking solutions for small businesses that rely on their vehicles to get the job done, providing individuals and businesses with scalable, secure and hardware-agnostic connected mobility services.
one_liner: Developer of a modular SaaS platform designed to build, launch, and scale connected mobility services. The company's platform, applications, and services deliver a smarter, safer, and more convenient car ownership experience for the global driving community and offer GPS fleet tracking solutions for small businesses that rely on their vehicles to get the job done, providing individuals and businesses with scalable, secure and hardware-agnostic connected mobility services.

name: Omnitron Sensors Inc.
description: Developer of an automotive sensor platform designed to permit autonomous cars and drones to travel safely with high-performance and low-cost sensors. The company's sensors offer full autonomy to self-driving cars and drones with novel silicon photonics processes for sensors in safety-critical systems, it writes the script for building high-performance and low-cost sensors, enabling clients to get tools to make driverless driving safe.

The company's sensors offer full autonomy to self-driving cars and drones with novel silicon photonics processes for sensors in safety-critical systems, it writes the script for building high-performance and low-cost sensors, enabling clients to get tools to make driverless driving safe.

name: Preteckt, Inc.
description: Building the AI vehicle diagnostic technician.
one_liner: Building the AI vehicle diagnostic technician.

name: PurismEV Inc.
description: Operator of an AI energy efficiency company intended to improve motor and battery efficiency based on driving patterns. The company offers various services such as reducing environmental impact, increasing vehicle lifetime, reducing battery size, improving range performance, increasing energy efficiency, and improving acceleration, providing users with real-time vehicle monitoring.
one_liner: Operator of an AI energy efficiency company intended to improve motor and battery efficiency based on driving patterns. The company offers various services such as reducing environmental impact, increasing vehicle lifetime, reducing battery size, improving range performance, increasing energy efficiency, and improving acceleration, providing users with real-time vehicle monitoring.

name: Rovilus, Inc.
description: Developer of battery technologies designed to accelerate the adoption of clean energy. The company's technologies develop products that use thermal management technology to provide batteries made of fire-suppression material and have an extended lifetime, enabling companies to increase their operational efficiency and reduce their total cost of operation.
one_liner: Developer of battery technologies designed to accelerate the adoption of clean energy. name: Webdee Group Co., Ltd.
description: Operator of a car listing platform intended to provide information about cars available for buying or selling. The company's platform works with official dealers, who have cars available for sale and are willing to give a discount to customers, enabling clients to smoothen out the process of buying and selling their cars.
one_liner: Operator of a car listing platform intended to provide information about cars available for buying or selling. The company's platform works with official dealers, who have cars available for sale and are willing to give a discount to customers, enabling clients to smoothen out the process of buying and selling their cars.

name: Sleek EV Pte Ltd.
description: Manufacturer of electric scooters designed for urban riding and create a world where green vehicles become the new standard. The company's scooters utilize motors with field-oriented control, ensuring power optimization and maximum acceleration and removable batteries that can be charged in-bike or via sockets, enabling users to travel efficiently and sustainably.
one_liner: Manufacturer of electric scooters designed for urban riding and create a world where green vehicles become the new standard. The company's scooters utilize motors with field-oriented control, ensuring power optimization and maximum acceleration and removable batteries that can be charged in-bike or via sockets, enabling users to travel efficiently and sustainably.

name: Glacierwater Holdings Pte. Ltd.
description: Manufacturer of reusable batteries intended to make clean mobility accessible to everyone in emerging countries. The company's battery-swapping technology allows for easy replacement and loading in charged batteries, enabling clients to adopt electric vehicles, contributing to the environment by reducing carbon emissions, and improving the quality of life for people.

name: PT Truktop Teknologi Global
description: Operator of a truck dealership platform based in Jakarta, Indonesia. The company's platform helps to facilitate buying and selling of trucks online, enabling clients to support their transportation business.
one_liner: Operator of a truck dealership platform based in Jakarta, Indonesia. The company's platform helps to facilitate buying and selling of trucks online, enabling clients to support their transportation business.

name: Upshift, Inc.
description: Fractional car subscription for people who don't need a car every day
one_liner: Fractional car subscription for people who don't need a car every day

name: VR Motion Corp.
description: Developer of VR enterprise software and hardware designed to improve driver training. The company's platform provides ultra-realistic virtual reality driver training systems to companies in the public, commercial, and private sectors for logistics controlling, enabling transportation and distribution industry clients to reduce the cost and risk to hire and retain employees.

The company's platform provides ultra-realistic virtual reality driver training systems to companies in the public, commercial, and private sectors for logistics controlling, enabling transportation and distribution industry clients to reduce the cost and risk to hire and retain employees.

name: XING Technology Inc.
description: Developer of automotive-grade electric vehicle batteries for specialty applications, mainly industrial applications. The company develops advanced energy storage and electric drive technology using the development of extreme performance race cars and supercars as their research and development platform and immersed cooling battery system, which can be applied to a wide range of electric vehicles and energy storage systems, thereby creating a stable and safe thermal management solution for battery systems, and providing a safer and more reliable option for the industrial energy transition aiming to create a sustainable world.

name: Volta Industries, Inc.
description: Provider of electric vehicle charging stations intended to make communities more sustainable. The company's vehicle charging stations partners with brands to sponsor free charging for all electric vehicle drivers for free, enabling brands to meet consumers at the optimal moment of purchase decision.
one_liner: Provider of electric vehicle charging stations intended to make communities more sustainable. The company's vehicle charging stations partners with brands to sponsor free charging for all electric vehicle drivers for free, enabling brands to meet consumers at the optimal moment of purchase decision.

name: Exipple Studio, Inc (SL)
description: Provider of an artificial intelligence based software platform designed to revolutionize the way humans interact with technology. The company's platform enables cameras and sensors to see, understand, and respond to human movement and behavior in any environment or context, providing enterprises with precision tracking of any shape, object and motion.
